title: Midterm Exam Date Announced
description: The midterm exam will be held on April 15, 2025. All students are advised to prepare accordingly and check their respective emails for further details.

title: New Practice Test Available
description: A new practice test for the aptitude section is now available on the platform. Visit the tests section to try it out.

title: Maintenance Downtime Scheduled
description: The platform will undergo scheduled maintenance on April 12, 2025, from 2:00 AM to 4:00 AM. Please plan your tests accordingly.

title: Guest Lecture on Career Guidance
description: We are pleased to announce a guest lecture on career guidance by industry experts. More details on the venue and schedule will follow soon.

title: Updated Syllabus for Practice Tests
description: The syllabus for practice tests has been updated. Please review the new topics and adjust your revision plan accordingly.

title: Holiday Notice: Good Friday
description: The institution will remain closed on March 29, 2025, in observance of Good Friday.

title: Deadline for Course Registration
description: Students must complete their course registration by April 10, 2025. Late registrations will not be accepted.

title: Hackathon Registrations Open
description: Registrations for the Inter-College Hackathon 2025 are now open. Visit the events page for more information and to register.

title: Lab Assessment Schedule Released
description: The lab assessment timetable for the semester has been released. Check the student portal to view your batch's schedule.

title: Coding Contest Results Published
description: Results for the recent intra-college coding contest are out. Congratulations to all participants!

title: Library New Arrivals - April
description: Check out the new arrivals at the library including titles on AI, Data Science, and Web Development.

title: Student Council Elections Next Week
description: Elections for the new student council will be held next week. Eligible students may file nominations till April 4, 2025.

title: Class Representative Meeting
description: A mandatory meeting for all class representatives is scheduled for April 13, 2025, in Room 301 at 4:00 PM.

title: Internship Opportunities from TCS
description: TCS is offering internship opportunities for pre-final year students. Apply via the placement portal.

title: Exam Hall Tickets Released
description: Students can now download their hall tickets from the dashboard under the 'Examinations' section.

title: Annual Tech Fest Announced
description: Our annual tech fest will be conducted on May 2nd & 3rd. Registrations for various events open soon.

title: Scholarship Disbursement Completed
description: The disbursement process for the merit-based scholarship for semester 5 has been completed.

title: Peer Tutoring Program Launch
description: Weâ€™re launching a peer tutoring initiative to support students struggling in core subjects. Details inside.

title: Important: Profile Update Reminder
description: All students must update their contact details and address on the student portal by April 20, 2025.

title: Cybersecurity Awareness Week
description: Join us for a week of workshops and activities on cybersecurity, starting April 14, 2025.
